404.title: 404 Page not found
404.subtext_html: The page you requested does not exist. Click here to continue shopping.

search.title: Search

onboarding.no_products_html: You have no products in your home page collection. This placeholder will appear until you add a product to this collection.
onboarding.product_description: This area is used to describe your product’s details. Tell customers about the look, feel, and style of your product. Add details on color, materials used, sizing, and where it was made.
onboarding.no_collections_html: You don't have any collections to show here. Add some collections to go along with the default home page.
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn’t published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify’s ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.

comments.name: Name
comments.moderated: Please note, comments must be approved before they are published
comments.success_moderated: Your comment was posted successfully. We will publish it in a little while, as our blog is moderated.
comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!

subscriptions.error: There was an error loading your subscriptions
subscriptions.no_subs: You do not have any subscriptions yet

subscription.fetch_error: There was an error fetching the detail subscription
subscription.auth_error: There was authorization error, please login again
subscription.billing_attepts_error: There was an error loading the billing attempts
subscription.cancel_prompt_title: Canceling subscription cannot be undone. If you want to resume shipments, you will need to create a new order in the store.
subscription.cancel_error: There was an error trying to cancel your subscription
subscription.new_payment_method_error: Unknown error adding your payment method. Please try again.
subscription.remove_line_error: There was an error trying to remove the product
subscription.update_payment_success: An email was sent to {{email}} with a secure link to update payment information.
subscription.update_payment_success_dunning: An email was sent to {{email}} with a secure link to update payment information. After payment information is updated we will retry the order.
subscription.update_payment_success_payment_error: Unable to add payment method. An email was sent to {{email}} with a secure link to update payment.
subscription.update_payment_error: There was an error updating your payment information
subscription.sales_tax: Sales tax (if applicable) is not displayed because it is calculated with each new order.
subscription.skip_billing_interval_prompt: Are you sure you want to skip?
subscription.skip_billing_interval_success: Your next order has been rescheduled to {{date}}
subscription.skip_billing_interval_error: There was an error skipping your next order
subscription.next_order_success: Your next order has been rescheduled to {{date}}
subscription.next_order_error: There was an error setting the subscription's next order date.
subscription.address_update_failed: We encountered an unknown error. Please try again.
subscription.pause_disclaimer_date: We will postpone your subscription. Your subscription will remain active, but you will not be charged until {{date}}. You can reschedule any time.
subscription.pause_disclaimer_indefinitely: You will not be charged while your subscription is paused. Reactivate your subscription anytime in your account.
subscription.reactivate_success: Your subscription has been successfully reactivated.
subscription.reactivate_error: Something went wrong while reactivating your subscription. Please try again
subscription.order_now_modal_body: You will be charged {{amount}} and your shipment will go out as soon as possible.
subscription.frequency_update_error: Unknown error. Delivery frequency could not be updated.
subscription.customer_update_error: Unknown error. Customer information could not be updated.
subscription.customer_update_info: Adding your phone number, you will receive free SMS with information about your next subscription, allowing you to skip it,or editing it through your phone
subscription.verify_code_error: There was an error verifying your phone number.
subscription.verify_code_retry_error: You have tried to verify your phone number too many times. Please, try it later.
subscription.code_received: You must have received a confirmation code in the provided phone number.
subscription.code_enter: Please enter the code below to verify your phone number.
subscription.failed_payment_message: Failed payment with saved method. We will automatically retry payment.
subscription.delayedNotification: Subscription delayed due to inventory. Order will ship when item becomes available. To receive order more quickly, please update selection below.
subscription.update_success: Your subscription has been updated successfully.
subscription.update_line_success: Subscription updated. The order will ship out as soon as possible.
subscription.update_error: Something went wrong. Your subscription has not been changed.

login.check_email: Check your email for login link

login.no_subscriptions_message: We couldn't find any subscriptions associated with

addons.title: ONE TIME ADD-ONS
addons.success_added: Successfully added items to your subscription.
addons.subtitle: Take 15% off these limited-time specials!
addons.modal_title: Add products to your next order

sms.title: Text updates
sms.enable_phone_text: Text messages allow you to update subscriptions on the go. Message and. data rates may apply.
sms.invalid_country: Only US and CA phone numbers are supported.

frequency.title: Update frequency instead of losing subscription
frequency.subtitle: By updating your delivery frequency, you can control how often you recieve shipments.
frequency.formTitle: You control how often your receive deliveries. Upcoming orders will be delivered on the frequency selected below.

address.promptTitle: Moving doesn’t have to mean cancellation
address.promptSubtitle: By updating your address, you have the option of keeping your subscription with you wherever you go!
address.noShippingOptions: There are no shipping options available for that address.
address.confirmTitle: The price of shipping for your subscription will change from {{oldPrice}} to {{newPrice}} because your new address is in a different delivery zone.

pause.title: Did you know you can pause instead?
pause.description: Instead of cancelling, pausing your subscription allows you to keep billing and shipping details saved when you’re ready to reactivate your subscription.

skip.title: You can skip or reschedule your next order
skip.description: Keep your shipments coming once you’re back from your trip. Consider skipping or rescheduling instead of canceling.
skip.success: Your next order has been rescheduled to {{date}}

reschedule.description: Your subscription will remain active, but we will postpone your subscription until the date you select below.
